skillTree.localised_description: A fine steed from the Carroburg Stables.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

Carroburg is no longer the central and thriving city it once was for the Empire. Drakwald no longer with it's own Elector Count.  But Aldred von Carroburg was brought up with the stories of old. He commands the Carroburg Greatswords as if their heritage still holds that position of importance.

effects.description:
Ability: "Revered Regiment'' for Carroburg Greatswords (Greatswords)
	(Hero's army)

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

effects.description:
Melee Attack: +10 for Carroburg Greatswords (Greatswords)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: From the Wastelands to the River Reik, citizens of the Western-Reik sleep safely due to Aldred von Carroburg's forces marching along the shores and forests.
The Greatsword as a choice of weaponry among Captains and Generals is a rarity. But for Aldred, the Greatsword wields as lightly as the smallest dagger.

effects.description:
Recruit Rank: +2 for Greatswords units
	(Hero's army)

Recruit Rank: +3 for Greatswords units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The School of Oratory stands proudly in the centre of Carroburg, teaching young scribes and poets the ways of story telling. Al though Aldred showed more promise with a blade than pencil, he did briefly attend the school.
''Go here, says the Reiksmarshal. Go there, says the Reiksmarshal. I'm sick of it! We are a fighting force, not a marching force''.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: +10% after winning a battle
	(Hero's army)

enabled_if: Leadership is lower than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: Even the Ostland Blackguard can not match the fame and renown accumulated by the Carroburg Greatswords, and Aldred their last commander of true Carroburg heritage instills extra pride in every single soldier.

effects.description: Adds one extra unit of Carroburg Greatswords (Greatswords) to the recruitment pool

skillTree.localised_description: Beastmen, Greenskin, rebellious men, undead, Aldred has fought them all without any besting him. He fights with not just determination, but with spite.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

skillTree.localised_description: ''I said, no more! I will not be bossed around like some courier, We make a stand here! Men, with me!''.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.
